caption.title: Decrease in the O 2 consumption rate with time in samples taken from Qajaa, Sandnes, and Kangeq.
caption.p: Blue bars show the initial rate, red bars the rate after 6 months and green bars the rate after 14 months. The rates are normalized in relation to the initial rate. The n-values represent the number of different archaeological layers investigated. Error bars show ± 1 standard deviation.
